verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: New York state 's highest court] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [V: rejected] [ARG1: U.S. President Donald Trump 's latest bid to avoid potentially having to answer questions under oath in a defamation lawsuit by a former contestant on his television show " The Apprentice."</p] >

< p > New York state 's highest court on Thursday rejected [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump 's] latest bid to [V: avoid] [ARG1: potentially having to answer questions under oath in a defamation lawsuit by a former contestant on his television show " The Apprentice."</p] >

< p > New York state 's highest court on Thursday rejected U.S. President Donald Trump 's latest bid to avoid potentially [V: having] to answer questions under oath in a defamation lawsuit by a former contestant on his television show " The Apprentice."</p >
